data.title: Hickleton Golf Club
data.meta_description: Hickleton Golf Club, Yorkshire: Premier golf & unmatched hospitality. Explore courses, events & join for a top golf experience.
data.text:
Welcome to Hickleton Golf Club: South Yorkshire’s Premier Golfing Experience

Nestled amidst the pristine landscapes of Yorkshire, Hickleton Golf Club stands as a beacon for those seeking the ultimate golf experience. Conveniently positioned between the bustling towns of Doncaster, Rotherham, and Barnsley, our golf destination is a testament to the rich golfing heritage of Yorkshire. Just a short 3-mile drive from junction 37 of the A1(M), Hickleton promises an unparalleled golfing journey in the heart of South Yorkshire.

A Rich Legacy of Golfing Excellence Our journey began in 1909 with a modest 9-hole course. Today, we boast an 18-hole masterpiece, unveiled in 1976, crafted by the legendary Ryder Cup players, Neil Coles and Brian Huggett. Over the decades, we’ve honed and refined our course, making it one of the most sought-after golfing experiences in the region. As you navigate our undulating parkland course, you’ll be captivated by tree-framed fairways and breathtaking panoramic vistas of South Yorkshire and the eastern Pennines. As many of our esteemed visitors often remark, “Hickleton offers a sublime golfing experience amidst awe-inspiring scenery.”

Experience the Hickleton Hospitality At Hickleton Golf Club, every guest is special. Whether you’re part of a society, a group, or a solo visitor, our doors are always open, and our dedicated staff ensures your experience is nothing short of exceptional.

Tailored Golfing Packages Just for You Choose from a variety of packages designed to cater to every golfer’s dream. From a straightforward 18-hole game to an immersive 36-hole experience complemented by delectable food and refreshing beverages. And for those who love the crisp winter air, we offer exclusive winter packages from November to March.

Become a Member of Our Esteemed Community

Joining Hickleton Golf Club is more than just gaining access to a premier golf course; it’s becoming a part of a legacy. As a member, you’ll enjoy exclusive benefits, special rates, and the camaraderie of fellow golf enthusiasts. Dive into a world of privileges, events, and unmatched golfing experiences. Discover our membership options and embark on a journey with Hickleton that transcends the ordinary.
